verses.verse: Of Moab <WH4124>. Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>: Woe <WH1945> unto Nebo <WH5015>! for it is laid waste <WH7703>; Kiriathaim <WH7156> is put to shame <WH3001>, it is taken <WH3920>; Misgab <WH4869> is put to shame <WH3001> and broken down <WH2865>.

The praise <WH8416> of Moab <WH4124> is no more <WH2809>; in Heshbon they have devised <WH2803> evil <WH7451> against her <WH3212>: Come, and let us cut her off <WH3772> from being a nation <WH1471>. Thou also <WH4086>, O Madmen, shalt be brought <WH1826> to silence <WH2719>: the sword shall pursue <WH3212> thee <WH310>.
The sound <WH6963> of a cry <WH6963> from Horonaim <WH2773>, desolation <WH7701> and great <WH1419> destruction <WH7701>!
Moab <WH4124> is destroyed <WH7665>; her little ones <WH6810> have caused a cry <WH2201> to be heard <WH8085>.

For by the ascent <WH4608> of Luhith <WH3872> with continual <WH1065> weeping <WH1065> shall they go up <WH5927>; for at the descent <WH4174> of Horonaim <WH2773> they <WH6862> have heard <WH8085> the distress of the cry <WH6818> of destruction <WH7667>.
Flee <WH5127>, save <WH4422> your lives <WH5315>, and be <WH1961> like the heath <WH6176> in the wilderness <WH4057>.

For <WH982>, because thou hast trusted in thy works <WH4639> and in thy treasures <WH214>, thou also shalt be taken <WH3920>: and Chemosh <WH3645> shall go forth <WH3318> into captivity <WH1473>, his priests <WH3548> and his princes <WH8269> together <WH3162>.

And the destroyer <WH7703> shall come <WH935> upon every city <WH5892>, and no city <WH5892> shall escape <WH4422>; the valley <WH6010> also shall perish <WH6>, and the plain <WH4334> shall be destroyed <WH8045>; as Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH559>.

Give <WH5414> wings <WH6731> unto Moab <WH4124>, that she may fly <WH5323> and get her away <WH3318>: and her cities <WH5892> shall become a desolation <WH8047>, without any to dwell <WH3427> therein <WH2004>.
Cursed <WH779> be he that doeth <WH6213> the work <WH4399> of Jehovah <WH3068> negligently <WH7423>; and cursed <WH779> be he that keepeth back <WH4513> his sword <WH2719> from blood <WH1818>.

Moab <WH4124> hath been at ease <WH7599> from his youth <WH5271>, and he hath settled <WH8252> on his lees <WH8105>, and hath not been emptied <WH7324> from vessel <WH3627> to vessel <WH3627>, neither hath he gone <WH1980> into captivity <WH1473>: therefore his taste <WH2940> remaineth <WH5975> in him <WH7381>, and his scent is not changed <WH4171>.

Therefore <WH3117>, behold, the days come <WH935>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, that I will send <WH7971> unto him them that pour <WH6808> off <WH6808>, and they shall pour him off <WH7324>; and they shall empty his vessels <WH3627>, and break <WH5310> their bottles in pieces <WH5035>.
And Moab <WH4124> shall be ashamed <WH954> of Chemosh <WH3645>, as the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> was ashamed <WH954> of Beth-el <WH1008> their confidence <WH4009>.
How say <WH559> ye <WH1368>, We are mighty men <WH2428>, and valiant men <WH582> for the war <WH4421>?

Moab <WH4124> is laid waste <WH7703>, and they are gone up <WH5927> into his cities <WH5892>, and his chosen <WH4005> young men <WH970> are gone down <WH3381> to the slaughter <WH2874>, saith <WH5002> the King <WH4428>, whose name <WH8034> is Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>.
The calamity <WH343> of Moab <WH4124> is near <WH7138> to come <WH935>, and his affliction <WH7451> hasteth <WH4116> fast <WH3966>.

All ye that are round about <WH5439> him <WH5110>, bemoan him <WH3045>, and all ye that know his name <WH8034>; say <WH559>, How is the strong <WH5797> staff <WH4294> broken <WH7665>, the beautiful <WH8597> rod <WH4731>!

O thou daughter <WH1323> that dwellest <WH3427> in Dibon <WH1769>, come down <WH3381> from thy glory <WH3519>, and sit <WH3427> in thirst <WH6772>; for the destroyer <WH7703> of Moab <WH4124> is come <WH5927> up against thee <WH7843>, he hath destroyed thy strongholds <WH4013>.

O inhabitant <WH3427> of Aroer <WH6177>, stand <WH5975> by the way <WH1870>, and watch <WH6822>: ask <WH7592> him that fleeth <WH5127>, and her that escapeth <WH4422>; say <WH559>, What hath been done <WH1961>?
Moab <WH4124> is put to shame <WH3001>; for it is broken down <WH2865>: wail <WH3213> and cry <WH2199>; tell <WH5046> ye it by the Arnon <WH769>, that Moab <WH4124> is laid waste <WH7703>.
And judgment <WH4941> is come <WH935> upon the plain <WH4334> country <WH776>, upon Holon <WH2473>, and upon Jahzah <WH3096>, and upon Mephaath <WH4158>,
and upon Dibon <WH1769>, and upon Nebo <WH5015>, and upon Beth-diblathaim <WH1015>,
and upon Kiriathaim <WH7156>, and upon Beth-gamul <WH1014>, and upon Beth-meon <WH1010>,
and upon Kerioth <WH7152>, and upon Bozrah <WH1224>, and upon all the cities <WH5892> of the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, far <WH7350> or near <WH7138>.
The horn <WH7161> of Moab <WH4124> is cut off <WH1438>, and his arm <WH2220> is broken <WH7665>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>.
Make ye him drunken <WH7937>; for he magnified <WH1431> himself against Jehovah <WH3068>: and Moab <WH4124> shall wallow <WH5606> in his vomit <WH6892>, and he also shall be in derision <WH7814>.
For was not Israel <WH3478> a derision <WH7814> unto thee <WH4672>? was he found among thieves <WH1590>? for as often <WH1767> as thou speakest <WH1697> of him <WH5110>, thou waggest the head.

O ye inhabitants <WH3427> of Moab <WH4124>, leave <WH5800> the cities <WH5892>, and dwell <WH3427> in the rock <WH5553>; and be like the dove <WH3123> that maketh her nest <WH7077> over <WH5676> the mouth <WH6310> of the abyss <WH6354>.

We have heard <WH8085> of the pride <WH1347> of Moab <WH4124>, that he is very <WH3966> proud <WH1343>; his loftiness <WH1363>, and his pride <WH1347>, and his arrogancy <WH1346>, and the haughtiness <WH7312> of his heart <WH3820>.
I know <WH3045> his wrath <WH5678>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, that it is nought <WH907>; his boastings have wrought nothing <WH6213>.
Therefore will I wail <WH3213> for Moab <WH4124>; yea <WH2199>, I will cry out for all Moab <WH4124>: for the men <WH582> of Kir-heres <WH7025> shall they mourn <WH1897>.

With more than the weeping <WH1065> of Jazer <WH3270> will I weep <WH1058> for thee <WH1612>, O vine of Sibmah <WH7643>: thy branches <WH5189> passed over <WH5674> the sea <WH3220>, they reached <WH5060> even to the sea <WH3220> of Jazer <WH3270>: upon thy summer fruits <WH7019> and upon thy vintage <WH1210> the destroyer <WH7703> is fallen <WH5307>.

And gladness <WH1524> and joy <WH8057> is taken <WH622> away from the fruitful field <WH3759> and from the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>; and I have caused wine <WH3196> to cease <WH7673> from the winepresses <WH3342>: none shall tread <WH1869> with shouting <WH1959>; the shouting <WH1959> shall be no shouting <WH1959>.

From the cry <WH2201> of Heshbon <WH2809> even unto Elealeh <WH500>, even unto Jahaz <WH3096> have they uttered <WH5414> their voice <WH6963>, from Zoar <WH6820> even unto Horonaim <WH2773>, to Eglath <WH5697> - shelishiyah <WH7992>: for the waters <WH4325> of Nimrim <WH5249> also shall become desolate <WH4923>.

Moreover I will cause to cease <WH7673> in Moab <WH4124>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, him that offereth <WH5927> in the high place <WH1116>, and him that burneth incense <WH6999> to his gods <WH430>.

Therefore my heart <WH3820> soundeth <WH1993> for Moab <WH4124> like pipes <WH2485>, and my heart <WH3820> soundeth <WH1993> like pipes <WH2485> for the men <WH582> of Kir-heres <WH7025>: therefore the abundance <WH3502> that he hath gotten <WH6213> is perished <WH6>.
For every head <WH7218> is bald <WH7144>, and every beard <WH2206> clipped <WH1639>: upon all the hands <WH3027> are cuttings <WH1417>, and upon the loins <WH4975> sackcloth <WH8242>.

On all the housetops <WH1406> of Moab <WH4124> and in the streets <WH7339> thereof there is lamentation <WH4553> every where <WH7665>; for I have broken Moab <WH4124> like a vessel <WH3627> wherein none delighteth <WH2656>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>.

How is it broken down <WH2865>! how do they wail <WH3213>! how hath Moab <WH4124> turned <WH6437> the back <WH6203> with shame <WH954>! so shall Moab <WH4124> become a derision <WH7814> and a terror <WH4288> to all that are round about him <WH5439>.
For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Behold <WH1675>, he shall fly as an eagle <WH5404>, and shall spread <WH6566> out his wings <WH3671> against Moab <WH4124>.

Kerioth <WH7152> is taken <WH3920>, and the strongholds <WH4679> are seized <WH3920>, and the heart <WH3820> of the mighty men <WH1368> of Moab <WH4124> at that day <WH3117> shall be as the heart <WH3820> of a woman <WH802> in her pangs <WH6887>.
And Moab <WH4124> shall be destroyed <WH8045> from being a people <WH5971>, because he hath magnified <WH1431> himself against Jehovah <WH3068>.
Fear <WH6343>, and the pit <WH6354>, and the snare <WH6341>, are upon thee <WH3427>, O inhabitant of Moab <WH4124>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>.

He that fleeth <WH5127> from <WH6440> the fear <WH6343> shall fall <WH5307> into the pit <WH6354>; and he that getteth up <WH5927> out of the pit <WH6354> shall be taken <WH3920> in the snare <WH6341>: for I will bring <WH935> upon him <WH4124>, even upon Moab, the year <WH8141> of their visitation <WH6486>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>.

They that fled <WH5127> stand <WH5975> without strength <WH3581> under the shadow <WH6738> of Heshbon <WH2809>; for a fire <WH784> is gone forth <WH3318> out of Heshbon <WH2809>, and a flame <WH3852> from the midst <WH996> of Sihon <WH5511>, and hath devoured <WH398> the corner <WH6285> of Moab <WH4124>, and the crown of the head <WH6936> of the tumultuous <WH7588> ones <WH1121>.

Woe <WH188> unto thee <WH4124>, O Moab! the people <WH5971> of Chemosh <WH3645> is undone <WH6>; for thy sons <WH1121> are taken <WH3947> away captive <WH7628>, and thy daughters <WH1323> into captivity <WH7633>.

Yet will I bring back <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of Moab <WH4124> in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>. Thus far <WH2008> is the judgment <WH4941> of Moab <WH4124>.
